#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	string s[]={"-----",".----","..---","...--","....-",".....","-....","--...","---..","----."};
	int dot[]={0,1,2,3,4,5,4,3,2,1};
	string text;
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>text;
		string ans="";
		int a=0;
		for(int i=0;i<text.length();i++)
		{
			ans+=s[(text[i]-'0')];
			a+=dot[(text[i]-'0')];
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl<<a<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
